description: This rustic, family restaurant in the historic centre serves local specialities, some of which are made using produce grown in the family vegetable garden. The inner dining room has a charming ambience, thanks to a natural cave which is hundreds of years old. Simple yet well - equipped guestrooms are also available.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
